title: We need a name for warwicks R->Q->fear combo
body: Obvious one is "wolfsec" but I bet boards can do better!

replies.body:
terrier tornado: referencing digimon, the pitbull terrier (most dangerous dog) and the speed at which he can execute the combo
5C's: the gray wolf has these taxonomic classifications above its species name
Order:	Carnivora
Suborder:	Caniformia
Family:	Canidae
Tribe:	Canini
Genus:	Canis
wolfsec: isn't that bad


but using all that info: i have come up with this 
Terrier-fy/fied: this refrences digimon, the dog, and tells what it does. and it is the punch line to this joke:
Q: How did the little Scottish dog feel when he saw a werewolf?
A: Terrier-fied!

it doesnt work

if you ERQ then E goes off as soon as R connects, can't chain ur cc

you get locked out of abilities and items during the jump too, no red smite cheese for example

what i mean is if you instantly press E and then R, the e instantly detonates. im pretty sure it was deliberate

It doesn't matter if you get locked out during Q or R. 

You cast E **after** R ends, then dash through them via Q; by the time the dash is over, E finishes popping and they're feared away from safety.
yeah but that doesn't as cool
but it actually functions; not to mention it fears the enemy team away from yours regardless of whether or not they interrupt the dash.
